Subject: Exclusive Invitation - Christian Louboutin Private Sale - May/June 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Guest,
 
We are delighted to invite you to the Christian Louboutin Private Sale.
 
To confirm your attendance, please book your appointment using the calendar link below.
 
Please note: Forwarding this invitation is not permitted.
 
https://calendly.com/christianlouboutin/exclusive_invitation_christian_louboutin_private_sale_june25
 
Entry is strictly limited to your reserved time slot (45 minutes per appointment) and is exclusively for the invited guest.
 
Terms & Conditions
 
By attending the event, you agree to the following guidelines:

chunks.text:
*	Location: D3 building 11.
*	Admission is strictly by invitation only. You must present this invitation email and a valid ID at the entrance for verification.
*	Invitations are non-transferable and may not be shared.
*	Publishing, posting, forwarding, or advertising this invitation or any part of its contents on the internet or social media is strictly prohibited.
*	Products purchased at the sale may not be resold to others or to resellers.
*	Photography and video recording are not allowed during the event. Mobile phone cameras will be secured in a dedicated pouch.
*	A maximum of 6 items may be purchased per guest.
*	All sales are final. No refunds or exchanges.
*	Payment must be made in AED by credit card only (Visa, Mastercard, Amex etc.)
*	Carry-on and tote bags are not permitted inside the venue. Shopping bags will be provided at the entrance.
*	Food and beverages are not allowed inside the venue.
*	Please do not arrive earlier than 30 minutes before your scheduled appointment.
*	Any violation of the above rules may result in permanent suspension from current and future private sale privileges.

 
Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you to an exceptional shopping experience at Christian Louboutin.

Christian Louboutin Team
Middle East


Ahmad Hiskol	
Assistant Operations Manager	
Retail Operations	
Christian Louboutin FZCO	
+971565031705	

​​
